[Damaged Equipment]
Equipment is sometimes damaged when enchanting or promoting.
Damaged equipment is usable, but cannot be enchanted or promoted.
To enchant or promote a damaged equipment, it must be repaired first.
Right-click on an enchantment additive in your inventory to use it during the enchantment.
Right-click on a Serghetto's Gear Protector in your inventory to use it during the enchantment.
- Required number of Serghetto's Gear Protectors: <font color='#FFD700'>{avoidDamageAmount}</font>
The number of Serghetto's Gear Protectors required depends on the enchantment level of the gear.
Right-click on a Serghetto's Safeguard in your inventory to use it during the enchantment.
- Required number of Serghetto's Safeguards: <font color='#FFD700'>{avoidDropAmount}</font>
